name: association of television and radio sales houses
goal:
egta is the trade association of over 140 advertising sales houses (either independent from the channel or in-house) which market the advertising space of both private and public Television/Radio stations all over Europe and beyond.

In addition to the traditional regulatory, monitoring and advocacy tasks of Brussels-based trade associations, egta is unique insofar as its fields of activities are extremely diverse and include: Training, Research and Databases, Marketing and Sales, Audience Measurement, Interactivity, Digital, Cross media etc.

egta is of the opinion that a real network is built through the exchange of knowledge, the sharing of best practice, tools, systems, research findings and through relevant debates among experts. It is thanks to this network of experts that egta can raise decision-makers’ awareness on the realities of the broadcast advertising industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives: AVMSD revision, Data Protection Regulation, e-privacy regulation, big data,Consumer protection, Audiovisual policies, media and content, advertising.
